other_tests.findings: Subsegmental atelectasis in both lower lobes, residual 7 mm nonobstructing stone in lower pole of the left kidney, unchanged subcentimeter hypodense lesion in the lower pole of the right kidney, unchanged 4.2 cm hypodense lesion in the interpolar region of the right kidney suggestive of a cyst, colonic diverticulosis involving the sigmoid and descending colon.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Few stones previously seen in the lower pole of the left kidney have passed; interval resolution of the right-sided hydronephrosis.
